name: tposeqi

body.origin:
|- wceq(ctpos(c0), ctpos(c1))
-| wceq(c0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(ctpos(c0), ctpos(c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ tpos(c0)= tpos(c1)
⊣ c0 = c1
⊣ (c0 = c1 → tpos(c0)= tpos(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ctpos(c0), ctpos(c1))
-| wceq(c0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(ctpos(c0), ctpos(c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ tpos(c0)= tpos(c1)
⊣ c0 = c1
⊣ (c0 = c1 → tpos(c0)= tpos(c1))

comment: Equality theorem for transposition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.)
